title: Game client, not appearing when trying to reconnect/after champ select
body:
Having a strange problem with connecting/loading to games. Was in a ranked lobby, everything seemed fine, no dc's, after the countdown hits 0 whenever everyone has picked/locked in their champs the game client disappears (no loading screen). On task manager, the game client doesn't appear on the applications tab however the processes do. Tried waiting a few minutes yet nothing happened. Closed the processes and opened up the client again, tried reconnecting however to no avail, same thing happened and i can't connect to the game.

tl;dr - CANT CONNECT TO THE GAME, WTF!

replies.body: Are you on Mac or PC (or even Linux!)? Who's your ISP?
